name: Altergeist Kunquery
desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you control an "Altergeist" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, negate the attack. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; while this monster is face-up on the field, negate the effects of that face-up card while it is on the field.
